name: Gingerbread Avocado Chocolate Mousse
description: Ginger bread avocado chocolate mousse - Vegan, gluten free, sugar-free, packed with nutrients, extremely delicious, and perfect for Christmas!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup almond milk or other plant-based milk

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients into a food processor and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Put all ingredients into a food processor and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve it together with coconut cream and fresh berries and sprinkle it with dark chocolate and cinnamon.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve it together with coconut cream and fresh berries and sprinkle it with dark chocolate and cinnamon.
